text: zaroor khuda aur farishton aur ilm vaalon ne gavaahee dee hai ki usake siva koee maabood qaabile parasatish nahin hai aur vah khuda adl va insaaf ke saath (kaarakhaanae aalam ka) saibhaalane vaala hai usake siva koee maabood nahin (vahee har cheez par) gaalib aur daana hai (sachcha) deen to khuda ke nazadeek yaqeenan (bas yahee) islaam hai
